蕓字的汉语字典释义

蕓字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕓； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1057第39
【唐韻】【集韻】?玉分切，音云。【玉篇】蕓薹菜。【本草註】此菜易起薹，須採其薹，則分枝必多，故名蕓薹。淮人謂之薹芥。　又蕓香草也。【杜陽雜編】元載造蕓輝堂於私第，其香出于闐國，潔白如玉，舂之爲屑以塗壁。　【集韻】或作蒷。

考證：〔【杜陽雜編】元載造蕓輝堂於私第，其香出於闐國。〕　謹照原文於闐改于闐。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　yun; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1057 page 39
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Jade split, sound cloud. 【Jade articles】Brassica oleracea. [Notes on Materia Medica] This dish is easy to sprout, and the sprouts must be picked, so there will be more branches, hence the name Brassica oleracea. Huai people call it scallop.　You Yun vanilla too. [Du Yang Miscellaneous] Yuan Zai built Yunhuitang in the private house. Its fragrance came from the state of Tian, and it was as white as jade, and it was used as crumbs to paint the walls.　【Jiyun】or Zuoju. Textual research: [[Du Yang Miscellaneous Edited] Yuan Zai built Yunhuitang in the private part, and its fragrance came from the state of Tian. 〕　I would like to change Yutian according to the original text.
